column1: As a player you can create a profile.
As a player you can delete a profile.
As a player you can view the profile that you have created.
As a player you can select a mode, either Time Trial or Campaign.
As a player you can select stages to play
As a player you can replay a stage.
As a player you can pause a stage at any point.
As a player you can restart a stage from the pause screen.
As a player you can exit a stage from the pause screen.
As a player you can select condiments and ingredients to build food items.
As a player you can scan through the list of purchaseable items in the game store.
As a player you can purchase ingredients and condiments for use in stages.
As a player you can purchase ugrades in the store for foods ans transport.
As a player the back button on a device will take you to the pause screen if you are in a stage.
As a player the back button on a device will resume the stage if you are on the pause screen.
